Power Supplies

Power Supplies

Design Criteria, Inc. is the only manufacture of exclusive, SMART power supplies for demanding applications. Check out our DC/DC and AC/DC converters for military, ITAR, industrial, telecom, and commercial environments. These are definitely not designs as usual. Our standard products are listed on this link. DCI’s custom and proprietary circuits provide unique power handling potential and high performance.

DC-DC Converters from Design Criteria, Inc.

Custom Robust DC-DC Converters

Design Criteria, Inc. (DCI) is the only manufacturer of custom military DC-DC converters to provide exclusive remote health monitoring.

AC-DC & DC-DC Converters

Our exclusive AC-DC and DC-DC converters meet the requirements for demanding applications.

Digital Controlled Converters

Digital controlled converters provide unique advantages to meet the demanding requirements for today’s complex military power electronics.
Capabilities

Our Capabilities

  • Design, development, and prototyping
  • High voltage insulation design
  • High or low voltage power supply
  • SPICE simulation
  • High voltage applications for TWTs and Klystrons
  • Worst case analysis
  • Minimized corona in high voltage modules
  • Off-load or turn-key manufacturing
  • Designs for high altitude and harsh environments
  • Certified assemblers to IPC-A-610D, J-STD-001 and IPC-7711/IPC7721
  • High power density designs
  • Quality of service designs
  • ITAR certificate
  • Digital Controlled Converters
  • Off-load testing
